name: BATHTUBS
description: Designed to fit into a three-wall enclosure, these are the most common type. They typically include a shower option and are space-efficient.

name: CABINET
description: Elevate your kitchen with the Modern Classic Kitchen Cabinet, designed to blend style and functionality seamlessly.

name: WALL ART
description: Equipped with advanced technology, these can feature heated seats, self-cleaning functions, and integrated bidets, providing luxury and convenience.

name: CUSHION
description: Also known as top-mount sinks, these are installed by placing them into a pre-cut hole in the countertop. The rim sits on top, making them easy to install..

name: PLANT POTS
description: A mirror is a reflective surface, typically made of glass coated with a thin layer of metal, like silver or aluminum
